content: We're open Monday through Friday 7AM-4PM, and weekends 8AM-3PM. Check the top of the page for today's hours.
Street parking is available on Maple St and surrounding blocks. There's also a public lot one block east. Arrive early during weekend brunch rush!
Yes! We have free high-speed WiFi for all guests. The password is on your receipt, or just ask any barista.
You can order online for pickup using the Order Online button, or simply walk in and order at the counter.
Our menu features artisan coffee drinks, fresh-baked pastries, and breakfast favorites. Try our signature Maple Latte! View the full menu on our Menu page.
We offer dairy-free milk alternatives (oat, almond, coconut) at no extra charge. We also have gluten-free and vegan options - just ask your server!
We're a casual cafe - no reservations needed! Just walk in and grab a table. For large groups of 8+, give us a call ahead.
Our coffee drinks range from $3.50-$6, pastries $3-$5, and breakfast items $9-$12. Check our menu for full pricing.
We're proud of our 4.8 star rating! You can see review highlights on our homepage or visit our Google Business Profile for more.
Give us a call at (555) 201-0001 during business hours, or send us a message through our contact page. We'd love to hear from you!
We're located at 123 Maple St in Atlanta, GA 30303. Look for the orange awning! Street parking available nearby.
We serve locally roasted coffee with options including drip, espresso drinks, cold brew, and pour-over. Our beans are ethically sourced.
Breakfast is served all day! Popular items include our Avocado Toast, Eggs Benedict, Breakfast Burrito, and Pancake Stack.
Our pastries are baked fresh daily in-house. Favorites include butter croissants, blueberry muffins, cinnamon rolls, and banana bread.
We occasionally host community events and coffee tastings. Follow us on social media or ask in-store for upcoming events.
